title: CylinderHandleAdornment
content:

name: CylinderHandleAdornment
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A cylinder-shaped handle that can be adorned to a Class.BasePart.
description: |
  CylinderHandleAdornment is a cylinder-shaped handle that can be adorned to a
  Class.BasePart. If parented to a player's Class.PlayerGui or the
  Class.CoreGui, handles can listen to input events for purposes such as
  making dragger tools.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - HandleAdornment
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: CylinderHandleAdornment.Angle
    summary: |
      Angle of the cylinder handle as in a "pie slice" sector.
    description: |
      The angle of the cylinder handle as in a "pie slice" sector. For example,
      if set to 90, a quarter cylinder will render instead of a full cylinder.
      This property can be combined with
      Class.CylinderHandleAdornment.InnerRadius|InnerRadius to render a sector
      of a hollow cylinder.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Basic
      - UI
  - name: CylinderHandleAdornment.Height
    summary: |
      Height of the cylinder adornment.
    description: |
      The height of the cylinder adornment in studs.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Basic
      - UI
  - name: CylinderHandleAdornment.InnerRadius
    summary: |
      Inner radius with which to render a hollow cylinder.
    description: |
      The inner radius with which to render a hollow cylinder, in studs. For
      example, if Class.CylinderHandleAdornment.Radius|Radius is 2 and
      InnerRadius is 1, the adornment will be a hollow cylinder with a "wall
      thickness" of 1 stud. This property can be combined with
      Class.CylinderHandleAdornment.Angle|Angle to render a sector of a hollow
      cylinder.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Basic
      - UI
  - name: CylinderHandleAdornment.Radius
    summary: |
      Radius of the cylinder adornment.
    description: |
      The radius of the cylinder adornment in studs.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''

      read: None
